title: Purse, 1900–30
medium:
Medium: cotton, glass beads, silk lining
Technique: Knitted crossed stockinette stitch of cotton threaded with glass beads. Worked as a tube, seamed at bottom, and lined with damask.
description: Beaded bag lined with beige silk damask with a drawstring top. The pattern is identical on both sides: a center panel with a prayer niche and lamp; geometric inner border, middle border with an abstracted floral design, and geometric outer border. In many colors, predominately beige, pink and blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Purse, 1900–30.
1900–30. Medium: cotton, glass beads, silk lining
Technique: Knitted crossed stockinette stitch of cotton threaded with glass beads. Worked as a tube, seamed at bottom, and lined with damask.. Gift of Elizabeth K. Leonard. 1969-136-1.
